description: Number of ways of getting 5 of a kind, a straight flush, 4 of a kind, full house, flush, straight, 3 of a kind, 2 pair, a pair in wild-card poker with 1 joker.
references: J. Emert and D. Umbach, Inconsistencies of "wild-card" poker, Chance, Vol. 9 (No. 3, 1996), pp. 17- 22.
links: Index entries for sequences related to poker
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 06 2000
